description: Unique identifier of the work order this line belongs to.
Line number within the work order for this LEM entry.
Sequence used to order multiple postings within the work order line.
Category of the item charged on this line.
Internal code identifying the specific resource, part, or service.
Classification code grouping the item for costing and reporting.
Descriptive text for the resource, part, or service on this line.
Actual quantity or hours consumed for this line item.
Unit of measure corresponding to the recorded quantity.
Price per unit or hour applied to this line.
Extended cost for the line, typically quantity multiplied by unit cost.
Date and time the activity was performed or posted to the work order.
Issuing warehouse or service location providing the item or work.
Specific bin or storage location within the warehouse.
Inventory transaction type code for this line; likely issue/return status. Confirm with SME.
Indicator that the referenced item code is valid/active.
Quantity received for this lineâ€™s item; likely a goods receipt measure. Confirm with SME.
General ledger account to charge this cost.
Management unit or cost center responsible for this transaction.
Code representing the maintenance activity or task performed.
Free-text notes captured for this line.

User-defined flag or list code for additional categorization; confirm with SME.
Shop or location code where the work or issue occurred.
Identifier for the sub-location beneath the primary location.
Identifier of the asset or unit charged by this line.
User who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User who last updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update.
Accounting control or posting batch number for this transaction; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether this line is taxable.
Tax rate applied to this line.
Calculated tax amount for this line.
Labor craft/trade associated with the work performed.
Source module or system that created the record.
Pay factor or premium multiplier applied to labor hours; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the technician or operator who performed the work.
Reference to a GIS feature or spatial object related to the work; confirm with SME.
Warranty expiration date applicable to the item or asset.
Meter reading at which warranty coverage ends.
Identifier of the supplier associated with this line.
Start date and time for the work on this line.
Finish date and time for the work on this line.
Month derived from the activity date for reporting.
Fiscal year associated with the posting of this activity.
Accounting period number used for posting.
Indicator that the line is locked from edits or posting.
